howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.description: Start your photography journey in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Join the Community
step1.description: Sign up for free and instantly access our forum to connect with photographers worldwide.

step2.title: Explore Presets
step2.description: Browse thousands of professional Lightroom presets in our marketplace. Find the perfect style for your photos.

step3.title: Engage & Share
step3.description: Share your work in the forum, get feedback, participate in discussions, and learn from the community.

step4.title: Sell Your Presets
step4.description: Ready to monetize? Upload your own presets to our marketplace and start earning from your creativity.
